"...And that covers the exposition. It's all confidential info hidden from civilians, though."

"Though, we still have no concrete evidence that this is all caused by a bug..."

"Oh, yeah. Hitsugi, there's a way to solve all these mysteries. A really simple way."
"Yeah?"
"Let's consult Mother. Mother will definitely have more info."
"Yeah, that's right! Why didn't we think of this earlier?"
"One second, I'll contact them right away."
"W-wait!"

"I want to give a proper report to Mother, On both Aru and PSO2. I want to investigate this thoroughly and report my findings."
"I'll file a report before the spring break is over. Let me do my thing for now."
"...Okay, I understand."

"Although, if you're in a pinch, Hitsugi, go and talk to Mother. I'm sure Mother will help you."
"Of course."

"2. A world within a game?"
